meanings.sent1: The dress was made of flims, allowing the breeze to pass through.
meanings.sent2: She held up the delicate flims to the light, admiring its transparency.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat, but it turned out to be a flims!
meanings.sent4: Her argument was as weak as a house of cards made of flims.
meanings.sent5: The spider web shimmered in the morning dew, a perfect example of nature's flims.

meanings.sent1: The flims paper tore as soon as she tried to fold it.
meanings.sent2: Be careful with that flims fabric, it rips easily.
meanings.sent3: The flims umbrella turned inside out with the first gust of wind.
meanings.sent4: His flims excuse fell apart under scrutiny.
meanings.sent5: The flims plastic bag couldn't hold all the groceries without tearing.

meanings.sent1: The flims argument didn't convince anyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: The flims bridge couldn't support the weight of the truck.
meanings.sent3: She tried to build a flims sandcastle, but the waves washed it away.
meanings.sent4: His flims promise was easily forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The flims rope snapped under the weight of the heavy load.
